channel.title: Serverless Java in action with Fn! on heapcon ⬣ a new conference by heapspace
channel.description: Recent content in Serverless Java in action with Fn! on heapcon ⬣ a new conference by heapspace

item.title: David Delabassee
item.description: David Delabassée (@delabassee) is a Software Evangelist working for Oracle; his primary focus is Java on the Server-Side including Java EE (Java Enterprise Edition). Prior to Oracle, David spent a decade at Sun Microsystems focusing on Java end-to-end, i.e. from the smart card to the high end servers. In his various roles, David has been involved in numerous Java projects since the early days of this technology. David lives in Belgium.
